short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin for checking if decks on NetrunnerDB are valid for your alt-format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin that allows for the creation for alt formats for the Netrunner LCG by FFG and WoTC. The plugin will automatically check any deck you look against all custom formats that you've created or imported. Also allows for the quick import and export of formats using JSON.
